abstract: A lawyer for the former hedge fund manager argued before appellate judges that the government’s request to secretly record Raj Rajaratnam’s conversations was riddled with problems.
snippet: A lawyer for the former hedge fund manager argued before appellate judges that the government’s request to secretly record Raj Rajaratnam’s conversations was riddled with problems.

headline.main: Lawyer Denounces Wiretaps in Appeal of Galleon Case
